quoteText: You agree that Apple may, in its sole discretion and without prior notice, terminate your access to the Site and/or block your future access to the Site if we determine that you have violated these Terms of Use or other agreements or guidelines which may be associated with your use of the Site.
title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
tosdr.tldr: Apple.com can delete your account without notice
